hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT studentAssignmentMark, student.nameWtInitials FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentAssignmentMark studentAssignmentMark, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo studentClassInfo, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.Student student WHERE studentAssignmentMark.studentClassInfoId = studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId AND studentClassInfo.student.studentId = student.studentId AND studentAssignmentMark.assignmentId=? AND studentAssignmentMark.gradeSubjectId=? AND studentAssignmentMark.year=? AND studentClassInfo.classGrade.classGradeId=? AND (student.statusId = 1 OR student.statusId = 3) ORDER BY student.nameWtInitials

SELECT DISTINCT studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo studentClassInfo, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.Student student WHERE (studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId NOT IN(SELECT stm.studentClassInfoId FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentAssignmentMark stm)) AND studentClassInfo.year = ? AND studentClassInfo.student.studentId = student.studentId AND (student.statusId = 1 OR student.statusId = 3) ORDER BY student.nameWtInitials
SELECT studentAssignmentMark FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentAssignmentMark studentAssignmentMark WHERE studentAssignmentMark.assignmentId=?

SELECT studentAssignmentMark.year, subject.description, assignment.name, studentAssignmentMark.gradingId, studentAssignmentMark.marks, studentAssignmentMark.isAbsent FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentAssignmentMark studentAssignmentMark, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo studentClassInfo, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.Assignment assignment, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.GradeSubject gradeSubject, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.Subject subject WHERE studentAssignmentMark.studentClassInfoId = studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId AND assignment.assignmentId = studentAssignmentMark.assignmentId AND gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId = studentAssignmentMark.gradeSubjectId AND subject.subjectId = gradeSubject.subject.subjectId AND studentClassInfo.student.studentId = ? AND studentClassInfo.student.statusId = 1
